skillTree.name: Wind Harmony
skillTree.description: The turbulent Winds of Magic can do little harm to those who have found harmony amidst its raging currents.

skillTree.name: Ranged Discipline
skillTree.description: The best way to repel the chaotic flurry of missile fire is to meet it with order, discipline, and a stalwart row of shields.

skillTree.name: Desert Armour
skillTree.description: Crafted from the unusual minerals of the Warpstone Desert, Zhao Ming's armour protects him from all but the fiercest blows.

skillTree.name: Desert Weapons
skillTree.description: Weapons crafted in the Western Provinces are forged from the strongest metals of the Warpstone Desert.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +15% for melee units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Iron Strength
skillTree.description: The strength and ferocity of the Iron Dragon and his forces have never been in doubt. His sanity, however…

effects.description:
Melee attack: +10% for melee units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Master of Metal
skillTree.description: Though madness seems to tug at Zhao Ming's mind, his mysterious crafts are nonetheless effective, relentlessly harrying Cathay's foes.

effects.description: Cooldown: -25% to Lore of Metal spells
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Final Transmutation Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Plague of Rust Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Lord of Shang-Yang
skillTree.description: Ogre mercenaries are a common sight in Shang-Yang, where their battle prowess benefits the armies of Cathay.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -25% for Ogre mercenary units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -25% for Ogre mercenary units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Strange Alchemy
skillTree.description: Cabals of Metal and Fire Wizards are welcome in the Western Provinces, where their strange alchemy bolsters the fortress of Shang-Yang.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -15% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Iron Scale
skillTree.description: The armies of the Iron Dragon harness his mighty strength, tearing through the armour of their enemies.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Plague of Rust"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Plague of Rust Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Plague of Rust Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Dragon's Breath"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Dragon's Breath Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Dragon's Breath Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Wall of Wind & Fire"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Wall of Wind & Fire Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wall of Wind & Fire Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Glittering Robe"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Glittering Robe Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Glittering Robe Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Constellation of the Dragon"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Constellation of the Dragon Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Constellation of the Dragon Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Final Transmutation"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Final Transmutation Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Final Transmutation Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Unyielding
skillTree.description: The Dragon Emperor guides every sword and spear of the norther provinces, inspiring a strength of arms to match an unflinching strength of will.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Peasant Long Spearmen, Celestial Dragon Guard, Jade Warriors and Jade Warriors (Halberds) units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Peasant Long Spearmen, Celestial Dragon Guard, Jade Warriors and Jade Warriors (Halberds) units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Peasant Long Spearmen, Celestial Dragon Guard, Jade Warriors and Jade Warriors (Halberds) units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Peasant Long Spearmen, Celestial Dragon Guard, Jade Warriors and Jade Warriors (Halberds) units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Peasant Long Spearmen, Celestial Dragon Guard, Jade Warriors and Jade Warriors (Halberds) units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sure Aim
skillTree.description: From lowly peasant to expert marksman, every arrow of the east soars with a Draconic power and grace.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +6% for Peasant Archers, Celestial Dragon Crossbowmen and Jade Warrior Crossbowmen units
	(Lord's army)

Range: +5% for Peasant Archers, Celestial Dragon Crossbowmen and Jade Warrior Crossbowmen units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Peasant Archers, Celestial Dragon Crossbowmen and Jade Warrior Crossbowmen units
	(Lord's army)

Range: +10% for Peasant Archers, Celestial Dragon Crossbowmen and Jade Warrior Crossbowmen units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +9% for Peasant Archers, Celestial Dragon Crossbowmen and Jade Warrior Crossbowmen units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Eastern Fires
skillTree.description: Ancient Cathay stands historically unconquered. Booming cannons and rockets of exploding fire help ensure it will remain so.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +5% for Iron Hail Gunners, Crane Gunners, Grand Cannon and Fire Rain Rocket units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +12% for Iron Hail Gunners, Crane Gunners, Grand Cannon and Fire Rain Rocket units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Iron Hail Gunners, Crane Gunners, Grand Cannon and Fire Rain Rocket units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Iron Hail Gunners, Crane Gunners, Grand Cannon and Fire Rain Rocket units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Iron Hail Gunners, Crane Gunners, Grand Cannon and Fire Rain Rocket units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Mighty Charge
skillTree.description: Who can withstand a charge with the sweeping force of a hundred hooves in unison?

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +12% for Peasant Horsemen, Jade Lancers and Great Longma Riders units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for Peasant Horsemen, Jade Lancers and Great Longma Riders units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12% for Peasant Horsemen, Jade Lancers and Great Longma Riders units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Peasant Horsemen, Jade Lancers and Great Longma Riders units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +18% for Peasant Horsemen, Jade Lancers and Great Longma Riders units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Stone Gaze
skillTree.description: Even the most inexperienced peasant rallies under the cold-eyed gaze of Cathay's most stoic guardians.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +4% for Wu Xing War Compass and Terracotta Sentinel units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Wu Xing War Compass and Terracotta Sentinel units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Wu Xing War Compass and Terracotta Sentinel units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Wu Xing War Compass and Terracotta Sentinel units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Wu Xing War Compass and Terracotta Sentinel units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sky Fire
skillTree.description: When fire hangs in the sky above the battlefield, death is sure to rain down upon it.

effects.description:
Speed: +5% for Sky Lantern and Sky-junk units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Sky Lantern and Sky-junk units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Sky Lantern and Sky-junk units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +15% for Sky Lantern and Sky-junk units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Sky Lantern and Sky-junk units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Blades of the Bastion
skillTree.description: Cathayan armies have been tested time and again, their skills proven in a tumultuous arena of bloodshed and near-constant war.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 for Peasant Long Spearmen, Celestial Dragon Guard, Jade Warriors and Jade Warriors (Halberds) units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Peasant Long Spearmen, Celestial Dragon Guard, Jade Warriors and Jade Warriors (Halberds) units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 10% for Peasant Long Spearmen, Celestial Dragon Guard, Jade Warriors and Jade Warriors (Halberds) units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fast Hands
skillTree.description: When the raging of battle begins, swift hands and swifter feet are the keys to surviving at range.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +6% for Peasant Archers, Celestial Dragon Crossbowmen, Jade Warrior Crossbowmen, Iron Hail Gunners, Crane Gunners, Grand Cannon and Fire Rain Rocket units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Peasant Archers, Celestial Dragon Crossbowmen, Jade Warrior Crossbowmen, Iron Hail Gunners, Crane Gunners, Grand Cannon and Fire Rain Rocket units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Peasant Archers, Celestial Dragon Crossbowmen, Jade Warrior Crossbowmen, Iron Hail Gunners, Crane Gunners, Grand Cannon and Fire Rain Rocket units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Unified Charge
skillTree.description: Swift, steady and moving as one, the hardy warriors of Cathay race headlong into battle.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Peasant Horsemen, Jade Lancers, Great Longma Riders, Terracotta Sentinel and Wu Xing War Compass units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Peasant Horsemen, Jade Lancers, Great Longma Riders, Terracotta Sentinel and Wu Xing War Compass units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Peasant Horsemen, Jade Lancers, Great Longma Riders, Terracotta Sentinel and Wu Xing War Compass units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Looming Lanterns
skillTree.description: A blanket of glowing lights amidst the clouds is sure to stir the heart of every Cathayan warrior beneath them.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 for Sky Lantern and Sky-junk units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Range: +15% for Sky Lantern and Sky-junk units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Sky Lantern and Sky-junk units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Recruitment
skillTree.description: All warriors of honour and pride are eager to fight under the Dragon-Emperor's banners.

skillTree.name: Reassuring Presence
skillTree.description: The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fervent
skillTree.description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.

skillTree.name: Irrepressible
skillTree.description: Every wound that is not fatal is but a lesson to learn from.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Logistician
skillTree.description: Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.

skillTree.name: Alert
skillTree.description: Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.name: The Great Bastion
skillTree.description: The blood-soaked battlefields of the northern provinces are the proving grounds upon which the mightiest warriors of Cathay have honed their craft.
